Text:
BMW Road Map Business 2011

Works with BMW Navigation System Business - iDrive models with small screen -  (e60, e90...) and the ones with MK4 computer and 4:3 screen black/ (e46, e38, e39...)
It doesn't work for the BMW Navigation System Professional
Hi cipri can you find BMW Navigation DVD Road Map Professional 2011 please.

Please cipri for E90, E91; please find it for me .
Thanks you are the best.

>> Lilfred 

here

BMW DVD Road Map Europe Professional 2011

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6180712/BMW_Navigation_DVD_Road_Map_Europe_BUSINESS_2011

Business DVD Set with 2 DVDs including the following countries: Andorra, Belgium, Denmark, Germany, Finland, France, Greece, Gibraltar, Great Britain, Ireland, Italy, Croatia, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Monaco, Netherlands, Norway,Austria, Portugal, Poland, San Marino, Slowakia, Slowenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Czech Republic, Hungary, Vatican City.

Further Information:

The Update Road Map Europe Business consists again of two discs The first DVD includes the well known Western European countries while DVD2 is covering the new Eastern European countries The details are given below

Coverage DVD 1

* Austria, Andorra, Belgium, Czech Republik, Denmark, Germany, Finland, France, Gibraltar, Greece, Great

*

Britain, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxemburg, Monaco, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal (incl. Madeira),

San Marino, Sweden, Switzerland, Slovakia, Spain (incl. Canary), Vatican City

Coverage DVD 2

* Austria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Lichtenstein,

*

Norway, Poland, San Marino, Sweden, Switzerland, Slovakia, Slovenia, Vatican City.

Further Info

TMC-Function in following countries:

* Germany, Austria, Switzerland, France, Great Britain, Italy, Netherlands, Belgium,Denmark, Spain,

*

Norway, Sweden, Czech Republic * Free TMC-Service is not available in all countries. For the reception of TMC-Pro services BMW offers country specific BMW Connected Drive services * 2D-Display additional to Turn-by-Turn instructions (For vehicles from 03/2007) * BMW Service Partners * Extended data for Eastern European countries * POI-Data in 32 categories

Instructions

* These maps DVD only function correctly after the system software update dated May 2005. * When the Loudspeaker and Traffic Message symbols are shown in the display and Guidance start/stop are

*

available, no further update will be required

Technical Information These DVD's can be used in following models:

* E60, E61, E63, E64, E81, E82, E87, E88, E90, E91, E92, E93. * Provided the Business Navigation system is fitted

Writing instructions:

* DVD 1 is just over 5 Gb, and must be written to DVD9 (DL). * DVD 2 is just under 4 Gb, and can be written to DVD5 (SL). * Use only ImgBurn or Alcohol 120% and only Verbatim DVD+R * The use of Nero is not recommended . * Set writing speed to lowest possible setting. * Use only DVD writers from the Recommended Writers list

Hi

Should i use CD-R because my bmw navigation dosent read dvd ?

Do i burn dvd1 or dvd 2 ?
If your bmw navigation doesn't read dvd, then this version is not for you.
thank you very much, works well for mine late 2003 e60
Thanks,Works With My BMW X5 2011 E63 :)
DVD2 works fine for E91 12/2008; Used Maxell DVD-R SL for DVD2 with my Pioneer DVR-118L and it works finel... haven't tried yet the DVD1... need firstly to buy DL disks... ;-)
DVD1 works also fine. I took the recommended DVD+R DL from Verbatim and my Pioneer DVR-118L Burner. Thanks a lot.

Can someone please be clear!!!
I have downloaded this using utorrent.
I have used imgburn to burn at 4x as stated, and 2x and 1x and 2.4x using DL  DVD+R but my sat nav just doesnt read.  
My 530d E60 had software update in2006 and so this should work.
Ihave tried using ultraISO and various other software but DVD is unreadable.
I have followed the exact instructions but no luck.
DO I HAVE TO CONVERT THIS FILE TO SOMETHING ELSE BEFORE I USE IMGBURN or do I just use imgburn on its own?
I have used imgburn on its own and it doesnt work! 
Im pretty good at following instructions so believe me when I say I have followed the exact instructions and more! tried various speeds, various software but no good!
please someone help me before i go and do something stupid like buy the dvd

FINALLY I got it working.
The only dvd burner that worked was InfraRecorder

Just added and burned  and bobs my uncle
